website_summaries.verdict: Most buyers find that this option has fewer digestive side effects than other brands.
pros: USDA certified organic, non-GMO, gluten-free, and vegan
Provides a better yield than other brands
cons: Some buyers had issues with the taste of this maca powder, finding it dark and bitter
Some issues with the zip-lock feature of the storage bag

customer_reviews.title: Not true maca
customer_reviews.text: Gave me immediate heart burn! and you can't return it!!! I bought this thinking it was true peruvian maca. It is not. Do a bit of research and you will find that true peruvian maca (the one with the medicinal qualities) is Lepidium peruvianum Chacon. Any product labeled as maca but having Lepidium meyenii as the ingredient, is actually a plant from Bolivia that isn't a true maca plant. Wish I would have known that before I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has a horrible taste. I used it one and it made my tummy hurt a few hours later. Maybe I started off with to much right away but I wish I had read the other bad reviews and not just look at the overall stars it has. Don’t buy this product and you can’t return it
customer_reviews.author: David Verdoorn

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste like good quality Maca
customer_reviews.text: Does not taste like good quality Maca, nor does it have the benefits normally experienced from using Maca. I was very disappointed with this product so I ordered a different brand just to make sure. I decided NOT to get a gelatinized Maca, because I felt this is not natural, and sure enough I found that the other Maca is perfect. The BAD news is I am not allowed to return this product and get my money back. Don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Giberson

customer_reviews.title: Created acne for me
customer_reviews.text: Think this is causing me to have major facial acne, painful zits sprouting all over my face Each morning. Haven’t had acne since high school, I’m wondering if it’s because my hormones are slightly elevated more than others, so it’s messing it up instead of regulating it. Wondering if anyone has this issue, and whether it’s a sign to stop taking it. Gonna try something different from terra souls because I love there packaging. Love the taste though and have a crap ton left
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Garren

customer_reviews.title: Better then hot chocolate.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this at first. It can be an adjustment to add a new taste to things you have had one way for a long time. But I found this recipe and this maca is the bomb in it. It is a dry mix you mix up and then add 2 TBS to a mug of hot milk or milk alternative. 1 1/4 cup cacao powder 1/2 maca 3/4 sugar of your choice 2 TBS cinnamon 1/2 TSP of cayenne (I use a bit less) 1/2 TSP of finely ground black pepper 1/2 TSP of sea salt
customer_reviews.author: Jean L.

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate's best friend!
customer_reviews.text: It goes well with anything chocolate. I like making hot chaca maca! Just cocao powder, maca powder, sweetener, and hot water. I add it to my morning oats and my homemade protein bars. It'll get clumpy if you don't dissolve it just right. I use hot water and a hand held frother and slowly add the powder as you're frothing. Then you can add the maca to anything!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Klug

customer_reviews.title: Bewared Menopausal Women
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for 6 months: I had a lot more sexual energy and drive, and more energy. After 6 months I started bleeding vaginally. It turns out that this product can thin the lining of the uterus and bring on bleeding. It is not recommended for women who are on hormone replacement therapy, as I am.
customer_reviews.author: L Be.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, works well!
customer_reviews.text: high quality product. Does it taste good? No. But its not nearly as bad as some reviews claim. It smells alot worse than it tastes so dont take a giant whiff of it. I find the flavor is pretty well disguised in coffee with torani sugar free caramel syrup and half and half. The point is not the taste though, i feel it gives me energy and has helped with everything. Im 4 weeks postpartum with hormones everywhere and this is a huge help. I dont feel so anxious/depressed and tired. It also helps with appetite regulation. I was eating over 3000 calories some days and now im down to about 2300 (i exclusively breastfeed).
customer_reviews.author: Heather LaFleur

customer_reviews.title: Great product but hardens quickly
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. Need to stir, shake bag often, very often. Or, just put some in a coffee grinder when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L.

customer_reviews.title: You need to check with your doctor. This is serious stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Severe rash. Caused severe rash and hives. This is not for the average person who is looking for a good source of Vitamine. I have threw it away. Check out the side effects: ALLERGIC REACTION Maca root can cause an allergic reaction in some people, according to the Physicians' Desktop Reference. Signs of an allergic reaction include tightness in the throat or chest, trouble breathing and chest pain. Maca root allergy can result in a rash or hives, as well as itchiness or swollen patches of skin. People who tend to suffer from allergies should consult with a doctor before starting any new drug or herbal regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Shaaban

customer_reviews.title: Do your research
customer_reviews.text: This is the way to go. I bought a raw one from another company and my husband complained that it gave him prostate discomfort. I threw the mother one away and changed to this one, Problem solve. This has a lot of benefits do your research.
customer_reviews.author: CRR

customer_reviews.title: This worked for my pms fatigue and mood swing
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is different but this item worked wonderfully for my pms fatigue and mood swing. I have tried many methods including various prescribed antidepressant, ginseng, evening primrose oil, black cohosh, st john's wort, etc for many years wasting my money and time, but Maca is the only product that worked for my pms fatigue and mood swing.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Braun

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Maca powder for 3 years, and I’m really grateful with the results in my health! I suffer hormonal disorder and using this Maca with the support of my doctor, I regulate my disease (that is my case). I highly recommend this product, because their quality, flavor, value is amazing compare with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite, would rather try something else
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of this maca powder. It has a very distinct taste and made me breakout which I have also read on other reviews... it was not super expensive but also not cheap and I do not see that there is an option to return or exchange for another product...
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great brand & flavor. Use in Smoothies & Yogurt
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor which to me tastes like Butterscotch. I use it in smoothies & mix 1/8- 1/4 teaspoon in plain yogurt with a touch of stevia. Happy to find an Organic Maca powder with NO prop. 65 warning. Have used this brand for other powders & seeds & happy with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking it for one month religiously. Have not seen any difference whatsoever. I doubt it’s genuine.Please don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Rajinder Grewal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for an amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Maca because of the organic manufacturing process that Terrasoul uses. I was even more pleasantly surprised when my packaged arrived completely filled (no air pockets) and the granules were super fine and obviously of superior quality. I used it in my morning smoothie right away and the Maca powder was super fresh and easy to digest. Thank you for paying attention to quality, quantity, and cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product... not the best taste initially but got used to it super quick when adding it to my coffee. Chocolate milk or smoothies are another option and shouldn't taste it all. Great GI benefits !!!
customer_reviews.author: ASW

customer_reviews.title: Just another part of health
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the money and has a nice nutty flavor
customer_reviews.author: Jan GLL

customer_reviews.title: Great quality gelatinized Maca root
customer_reviews.text: We really like this one in our family for everyday smoothies! No digestive issues as a result, only healthy adaptogenic benefits for myself and my husband! Bag last us 2 month with constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Ganna Shapoval

customer_reviews.title: Make a smoothy
customer_reviews.text: It was too nasty for me but i suck at making smoothies so someone whos good at that would probably be fine

customer_reviews.title: Must have for women with hormonal imbalances
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Maca helps balance my hormones tremendously! Due to hypothyroidism, I have a hard time balancing my sex hormones and this definitely helps me
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Steinman

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom to help regain strength after her knee surgery. It really helped boost her energy levels and have faster gains with physical therapy. She’s hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff - dissolves fast !
customer_reviews.text: I like that it dissolves in my coffee easily, the ingredients are good for you stuff and the price is more than fair! Thank you for this product, I will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Got it for health, eat it for flavor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to mix with muesli. I got it for health, but expected it to taste awful. I love the taste! It gives the muesli a rich earthy flavor, without adding sugar!

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: I used it right away and felt really good, focused and energetic. I prepared half teaspoon in a little water, the flavor was good and the smell too. I highly recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: Terrasoul Maca
customer_reviews.text: Mixed well but thats about it. Taste is meh, does not even seem like actual maca. No positive benefits noticed compared to other brands.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: It taste like dirt. I was trying to use this stuff instead of adderall and this stuff made me stress out. It made me feel like I was always running out of time to get stuff done.

customer_reviews.title: They just keep Jacking up the price!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes pretty bad, I see no positive effects AND they keep raising the price. I'm looking for a different supplier.

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel good
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my morning shake. It gives me energy and balance.

customer_reviews.title: Gelatinized Maca
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I purchased Maca in its gelatinized form. I love to add it to my smoothie: great taste and texture.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste I add it to my smoothies every morning and I really think it helps with my digestion.

customer_reviews.title: Not gritty. Mixes well.
customer_reviews.text: I add it to my smoothies and oatmeal in the morning. Nice and smooth, malty flavor. Not gritty at all!

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely is not for me. I can't get past the taste in anything I mix it in.

customer_reviews.title: Good company
customer_reviews.text: Really like this company for my supplemental needs. The maca powder blends very well in any drink. however the flavor was just too strong for me.

customer_reviews.title: good product

customer_reviews.text: I've used a few different brands, but I like the flavor and potency of this brand best. Highly recomend.

customer_reviews.text: I like it and it doesn't taste too bad, of good quality I recommend it

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Was ok but to thick and taste a bit strong.

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is not good
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is not good, but it has a good ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Boost of energy and focus
customer_reviews.text: I began using this product several months ago. I add a 1/2 tsp to Greek yogurt and fruit several times a week. I notice an uptick in focus and energy. It's a slight uptick but noticeable nonetheless. I have not had any negative side effects. Would recommend this product if you're looking for a natural boost.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered free from damage, Ive been adding to my coffee and I’ll post any updates. So far no problems at all.

customer_reviews.title: Great care went into it
customer_reviews.text: I trust this product. Great care went into it. I don't have the pick me up that others have with this but take supplements. I do notice a slightly better mood. Mixes easy in warm or hot liquids. Has a pleasant taste that resembles coffee brewed with chickory
